description.value:
Trigger You would gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Confused], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Controlled], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fleeing], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened], or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied] condition.

You create duplicates of your consciousness capable of fending off mental intrusion. Attempt to counteract an effect of your choice imposing one of the triggering conditions, using half your level rounded up as your counteract rank and your spell attack modifier as the counteract modifier.
